arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs FC Heidenheim Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
arts.sum: Stuttgart, currently sitting in 11th place, host FC Heidenheim, who are struggling in 16th, in a Bundesliga clash at 19:30 on Friday, April 25th. Both teams will be eager to secure a positive result, ...

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs. Heidenheim preview: Hosts aim to break home curse
arts.sum: VFB Stuttgart will be aiming to end a winless run at home in the Bundesliga when they welcome relegation-threatened FC Heidenheim to the MHPArena on Friday evening.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga Matchday 31 permutations: Title race, European battle and relegation
arts.sum: Bayern Munich's push for the title, a pulsating battle for the European places and a nail-biting scrap to avoid relegation - bundesliga.com breaks down who can achieve what and how on Matchday 31 of the 2024/25 season... This weekend, a win for Frankfurt will secure a top-six finish if both Borussia Dortmund (at Hoffenheim) and Werder Bremen (at home to St. Pauli) lose and both Borussia MÃ¶nchengladbach (at Holstein Kiel ) and Augsburg (in Leverkusen) fail to win.
